jd: From: Manoj Yadav, Tek Pyramids inc. manoj@tekpyramids.com Reply to: manoj@tekpyramids.com Database DeveloperWeehawken, NJ12+ MonthsPhone/Skype Hire US Citizen Only ! Requirements :  BS in computer science or engineering degree or a related field or equivalent work experience required. Experience in Requirement Analysis, Strategic Analysis, Software Development Fundamentals, Design, Development, Maintenance, Testing and Implementation of efficient data flow and batch processes in applications. Experience in TSQL programming, Perl or Python and Shell scripting. Good understanding of relation transactional databases like Sybase and MSSQL is a MUST;. Strong knowledge of Extraction Transformation and Loading (ETL) processes using TSQL with Java/Perl scripting. Experience in TSQL code development, performance tuning, query optimization and batch or ETL creation experience.Best Regards, Manoj Yadav | Technical Recruiter www.TekPyramids.com | Manoj@TekPyramids.com 24175 Northwestern Hwy, Suite 120, Southfield, MI 48075 MBE Certified
